Мы разрабатываем модели с учетом комфорт: We design models considering comfort, beauty, and simplicity, so every woman can find something for herself. On our website, you can place an order in minutes, pay conveniently, and arrange delivery to any city or country.

aboutDecabrina:
DECABRINA is a company engaged in the production and sale of pajamas, homewear, and accessories for women. All our items are original designs. Each piece is carefully developed with a focus on women's needs—beauty and comfort.
Before launching a new model, it undergoes testing to ensure we believe in it ourselves.

The FOUNDER of the brand—Yulia—is also the head designer. Launching her own women’s line had been her dream since her student years, and she is successfully making it a reality.

THE BRAND'S IDEA is to help women unlock their inner strength, beauty, and uniqueness. To remind them that we deserve to be beautiful even when no one sees us—at home! To help build harmony with oneself and one's body.

DECABRINA collections are known for simplicity, elegance, and uniqueness. A wide variety of models allows you to create your own perfect set—everything works well together.

OUR TEAM consists of the best professionals who are truly committed to the values and reputation of the brand.

Currently, we operate online—you can place orders via the website or through our social media manager.
We also offer a home try-on service to save you shopping time. If the desired item is not in stock, we can custom-make it in 5–7 days—just choose the model, fabric, color, and size—we’ll make it for you!

We are based in Tashkent (Uzbekistan), and we deliver across the Republic and worldwide.

We are ambitious, full of ideas, and eager to grow. We welcome collaboration offers both locally and internationally.


With love for what we do — DECABRINA Team
